name: Toon Bookmark
text: Add 1 "Toon World", or 1 card that specifically lists "Toon World" in its text, from your Deck to your hand, except "Toon Bookmark". If a "Toon World(s)" you control would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only activate 1 "Toon Bookmark" per turn.
